mapper.sql: COMPANY_ID, YEAR, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_AT, COMPANY_NAME, BEGIN_SCORE, COMPANY_LEVEL
mapper.select: select company_id,company_name from IT11.T_RPHG_PJ_COMPANY where YEAR = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')-1
mapper.insert: insert into IT11.T_RPHG_PJ_COMPANY (COMPANY_ID, YEAR, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_AT, COMPANY_NAME, BEGIN_SCORE, COMPANY_LEVEL) values (#{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifiedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beginScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{companyLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into IT11.T_RPHG_PJ_COMPANY
COMPANY_ID,
YEAR,

LAST_MODIFIED_AT,
COMPANY_NAME,
BEGIN_SCORE,

mapper.update:
update IT11.T_RPHG_PJ_COMPANY
LAST_MODIFIED_BY = #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_MODIFIED_AT = #{lastModifiedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
COMPANY_NAME = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BEGIN_SCORE = #{beginScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COMPANY_LEVEL = #{companyLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and YEAR = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
